mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, M.MEM_EMAIL, M.MEM_TEL, CM.CORP_MEM_DEPT, CI.CORP_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN CORP_MEM CM ON M.MEM_NO = CM.MEM_NO JOIN CORP_INFO CI ON CM.CORP_NO = CI.CORP_NO WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{memNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 1, MEM_STATUS_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
